title: Convert Number to Digit List in Python | Challenge
description: In Python, it is often necessary to convert a number into a list of its digits. This can be useful for various applications, such as performing mathematical operations on individual digits or manipulating numbers in a more granular way. In this challenge, you will be tasked with writing a function that takes a number as input and returns a list of its digits.
